#include <stdio.h>
int freq[1000000];
int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	int test,n,cnt;
	long i,ans,array[100000],j,max;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		for(i=0;i<1000000;i++)
			freq[i]=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		max=-1;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%ld",&array[i]);
			if(array[i]>max)
				max=array[i];
			freq[array[i]-1]++;
		}
		for(i=max;i>=1;i--)
		{
			cnt=0;
			j=i;
			while(j<=max)
			{
				if(freq[j-1]>0)
					cnt+=freq[j-1];
				j+=i;
			}
			if(cnt>1)
			{
				ans=i;
				break;
			}
		}
		printf("%ld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
